page.title: 08FARMING
page.content: Shirwell is an area of farming. Dairy farming is most common. Other farming carried out in the area is sheep and beef farming but this is not as popular as dairy. Dairy farming is carried out at New Barn Farm, East Plaistow, Sloely Barton, Sepscott and Brightlycott. East Plaistow is a dairy & beef farm.It was built around 300 years ago and has an area of 260 acres.Tractors trailers and an automatic milking machine are used instead of the old fashioned way. The house is made from cob (compostion of clay gravel and straw). The house was a lot bigger before a bedroom was knocked down and a slab patio outside the kitchen was put up in place of an old scullery. Also outside, a sheep pen was made into a bungalow.
